sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {Title} from "../../title"; import {User} from "../../user"; import {AppComponent} from "../../app.component"; import {HttpClient} from "@angular/common/http"; import {Router} from "@angular/router"; import {environment} from "../../environment"; @Component({ selector: 'app-published', templateUrl: './published.component.html', styleUrls: ['./published.component.css'] }) export class PublishedComponent { titles: Title[] = [] user: User | undefined = AppComponent.getUser() constructor(private httpclient: HttpClient, private router: Router) { if (!this.user) return; this.httpclient.get(`${environment.serverUrl}/account/published`).subscribe(titles => { this.titles = titles; }); } parseDate(date: Date): Date { return new Date(date); } }

Назва: {{title.titleName}}

Опис: {{title.description}}

Категорії: No categories(( {{cat.genre}}
Теги: No categories(( {{cat.tag}}
Серії: No serials {{cat.serialName}}
Likes: {{title.content.likesCount}}
Views: {{title.content.views}}
Date of creation: {{parseDate(title.creationDate)}}
